items.sentence: There\'s a very good chance that Tom won\'t be at school tomorrow.
I\'d like to buy a present for my son. Do you have any good ideas?
It\'s been almost four years since Tom died in a traffic accident.
Well, if dinner isn\'t ready by seven, I\'m going to a restaurant.
I can\'t imagine loving anybody as much as Tom seems to love Mary.
Tom just told me that he doesn\'t plan to help us paint our house.
Tom knew he didn\'t have enough money to buy everything he wanted.
Tom knew there was something in the box, but he didn\'t know what.
I want Tom to continue doing things just the way he\'s doing them.
Can you spare me a few minutes? I\'d like to have a word with you.
